## Overview

`gutils` is an R package to store and organize utility functions created by the [GIPSO](https://github.com/gipso) developer team.

Please note that some functions are not documented. Access the source code to see them all.

## Installation

You can install `gutils` from GitHub with:

``` {r, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("gipso/gutils")
```

We don’t intend to publish this package to CRAN.
